title: Harsher winter ahead? IMD expects next cold wave spell in these regions from Dec 3 onwards
description: Central India and adjoining regions are forecast to experience normal to below-normal temperatures this winter, with an increased likelihood of cold wave conditions in several northern and central states. While most of the country anticipates normal to below-…
content: Normal to below-normal temperatures are expected in central India and the adjoining northwest and peninsular regions during the three-month winter season, the India Meteorological Department (IMD) sa… [+2401 chars]
de: Härterer Winter bevor? IMD erwartet die nächste Kältewelle in diesen Regionen ab dem 3. Dezember. In Zentralindien und den angrenzenden Regionen werden in diesem Winter voraussichtlich normale bis unterdurchschnittliche Temperaturen herrschen, wobei in mehreren nördlichen und zentralen Bundesstaaten die Wahrscheinlichkeit von Kältewellen zunimmt. Während der Großteil des Landes davon ausgeht, dass die Lage normal bis darunter liegt, …
en: Harsher winter ahead? IMD expects next cold wave spell in these regions from Dec 3 onwards. Central India and adjoining regions are forecast to experience normal to below-normal temperatures this winter, with an increased likelihood of cold wave conditions in several northern and central states. la: Praemisit hiemem acerbior? IMD expectat proximam undam frigidam incantatores in his regionibus a Dec 3 sequentes. Media India et regiones vicinae praesagiunt sentire normales temperaturas infra normales hac hieme, aucta verisibilitate undarum frigidarum in pluribus civitatibus septentrionalibus et centralibus.
